content:
EventCommand Enum

Definition

Describes the command (ventArgs.Command property) that is passed to the stem.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource.OnEventCommand* callback.

In this Article

public enum EventCommand
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
EventCommand

Fields

Disable

Disable the event.
Enable

Enable the event.
SendManifest

Send the manifest.
Update

Update the event.
